title: Team Looking for MID & Support. Plat +
body: Hey guys, team that currently participates in a weekly circuit and regular weekend tournaments require a new midlane and support. Please message me in game if you wish to have a couple trial games. Plat plus. ign: zoz0

replies.body: I'd love to try :D hopefully im not too late cx
only plat+ or would you trial a gold who doesn't really play solo/duo anymore?
